html:
9.29.20  12:27 pm   do you have a date for your next upload?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.29.20  12:14 pm   What do you think about rage?

      can be a useful tactic in flower arranging

9.29.20  11:55 am   Do you still regret the thing you did in "I just did a bad thing"?

      even worse, i'm doing it again

9.29.20  11:21 am   What do you think is the biggest misconception about music and/or music theory?

      that anyone knows for sure how the heck it does what it does

9.29.20  11:06 am   How do I learn a new language?

      start by learning just 1 word

9.29.20  10:54 am   does the title of you new video have a title?

      no

9.29.20  10:13 am   how do you get your ideas?

      sometimes i pretend i'm in kansas and i'm supposed to decide which side of the road the land is on

9.29.20  10:10 am   Have you ever thought of making an unusually long song? Disregarding the fact that such a project would be a huge undertaking and require too much time for your liking.

      once you get past 5 minutes, it demands to be a video with too much story developments and non-music elements to be considered a song (while still containing a lot of music, surely)

9.29.20  10:01 am   have you removed the uppercase letters from your keyboard

      no that would make no sense, considering how much i use them

9.29.20  9:26 am   Do you like Star Wars?

      sometimes i wonder if there will ever be peace, in the stars

9.29.20  9:02 am   Why are some of your answers vague and others are extremely specific?

      i am trying to create a nice sampler pack, of specificity

9.29.20  9:02 am   What was the first language?

      free will

9.29.20  8:52 am   Why you're being chastised bill?

      because it takes way too long to do exactly what i do

9.29.20  8:09 am   was John Denver talking about West Virginia or the western part of Virginia?

      i always assumed he was talking about Colorado

9.29.20  7:59 am   Was it just a coincidence that I Just Did a Bad Thing speaks very true to everything happening this year? Or do you just read the future

      it's actually about more years than just this year

9.29.20  7:49 am   advice for young musicians?

      that depends on whether or not they think they have any problems

9.29.20  7:45 am   how do i write short stories 

      the whole trick is writing longer ones first, because otherwise the shorter ones will be perceived as average sized

9.29.20  7:02 am   How are you going to feel when you publish your next song? Please include as much data as you can.

      if i ever knew how i was going to feel at any point in the future then there would be no need to make songs

9.29.20  6:49 am   When is your new video

      doing it now

9.29.20  6:07 am   What are raisins?

      when you accidentally send grapes through the laundry

9.29.20  5:31 am   what year is it

      must be in the billions by now

9.29.20  5:25 am   Are you going to add a 3 second pause in your next project?

      it's more like 2 seconds

9.29.20  4:21 am   you ever think about how wack it is that humans are so smart and so dumb at the same time?

     if wack means interesting, which it might, as i understand 'wack' is a changing word

     like we figured out how to fly in huge planes and junk but still don't know how to spell necesarry

      spelling necessary might not be entirely necessary

9.29.20  4:10 am   i want to make videos but i feel like i don't look good on camera, and i just instantly lose all visible spirit of charisma and feel like i'm staring into a judgemental void which represents a bunch of strangers, and I don
't feel good enough and give up on the idea of even making videos itself because I stop believing in the beauty that made me want to make videos in the first place. how do i overcome this?

      if you already looked good you wouldn't need to make a video. that's one of the reasons people make videos ....... to make themself look good

9.29.20  3:55 am   Is there a low-pass filter on your voice at the moment the camel goes through the BRIDK WALL at the end of "hallelujah"?

      no

9.29.20  3:19 am   Do you ever have existential Crises?

      a long time ago i had one that never ended

9.29.20  2:13 am   Is it weird to spend hours looking at Google Maps while thinking of the future of Earth?

      no, this is recommended by doctors, especially earth doctors

9.29.20  1:14 am   What is your favorite Windows XP wallpaper?

      none, i like when you can see through the screen to the circuitry inside

9.29.20  1:12 am   How to deal with stress

      sing songs of joy

9.29.20  12:55 am   I know your probably not, but I've been following you from the beginning judging by all your songs it seems you have some extreme mental problems?

     ah yes, but you've conveniently left out the other half of the story, which is all the EXTREME MENTAL SOLUTIONS i have

     I can talk to you if you want, im no therapist but I want to do whatever I can to help this incredible music genius.  

      i always love to share anecdotes about visits to and from the simplicity police. can you believe that they actually need an aditional even simpler police force to keep them in check, it always feels like i just learned that recently, despite having already known it. as you can see this outlines the need for 2 simplicity polices

9.29.20  12:42 am   Are you working on a new video?

      yes

9.28.20  11:26 pm   why do alot of your vids just fade to black at the end?

      this is a technique i've inherited from cinema of the 1920s

9.28.20  10:24 pm   9.27.20  8:45 am what are your opinions on the abstract concept of a major 4 chord resolving to a 1?

      seems.... normal. i might even dare say it's very useful

9.28.20  9:00 pm   How much time do you spend on making these songs

      as much and as little as possible. this may sound like a paradox, but that's just the nature of CONFLICT AND INFIGHTING

9.28.20  8:40 pm   will you talk about velcro? 

      might scream about it

9.28.20  7:21 pm   are you normal?

      technically yes

9.28.20  6:10 pm   Are you working on a new video?

     yes

     just asking

9.28.20  5:49 pm   I know that after the hard times come the better times, but not in the moment of the hard time. What do I do?

      start making plans for better times

9.28.20  5:13 pm   how did you gain this much knowledge 

      this can be a side effect of dumbness, and stupidity

9.28.20  5:04 pm   what do you find more challenging: coming up with interesting melodies, or reimagining those melodies through innovative harmonies?

     the melody usually does not get re-imagined for that reason. it usually has the necessary harmony baked in automatically. then only slightly may need to re-imagine the details of the harmony to even better support the melody, but usually the first idea is the clearest

     by the way, i honestly really respect how you take the time to answer people's ueqstions.

9.28.20  4:54 pm   What do you think about the horse?

      sometimes i'm amazed at how much power it can have

9.28.20  4:31 pm   I just wanted to tell you that new caanan is such an amazing song and I really appreciate that you made it!

      holy grand central terminal departures list, you are very friendly

9.28.20  3:30 pm   What do you use to edit your songs and videos?

      we'll see

9.28.20  3:06 pm   Have you found any new 2 letter words yet?

      'ob'

9.28.20  3:01 pm   what's the cure for bread ?

      toast

9.28.20  2:49 pm   opinion on apples?

      very similar to oranges

9.28.20  2:05 pm   what's your favorite thing about sunrise land

      the evenings

9.28.20  1:55 pm   is the next song going to represent what you think of 2020?

      it was mostly written in 2012, but now that i think about it yes

9.28.20  1:45 pm   What do you think about eggplants?

      i'll believe it when i see it

9.28.20  1:16 pm   do you have an ETA (estimated tuesday of arrival) on your new song? If so, is it in 2020?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised
